Flow.description: RO-1677,RO-1718,RO-1749. RO -1788,RO-1986, RO-1959,Live Event removed,RO-2104, frontapp timestamp inclusion (adding start date due to sync), RO-2154, RO-2190, RO-2232, RO-2303, RO - 2266, RO-2366, RO-2410, RO - 2748, RO-2713

formulas.name: fml3months
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH(TODAY()) > 3, DATE( YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()) - 3, DAY(TODAY()) ), DATE( YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, MONTH(TODAY()) + 3, DAY(TODAY()) ) )

formulas.name: fml6months
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH(TODAY()) > 6, DATE( YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()) - 6, DAY(TODAY()) ), DATE( YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, MONTH(TODAY()) + 6, DAY(TODAY()) ) )

formulas.name: fmlHigherMqlType
fmlMQLTypeAccount
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK( {!$Record.Account.MQL_Type_Account__c} ) , VALUE( RIGHT( TEXT( {!$Record.MQL_Type_Contact__c} ) , 1)) , IF( {!$Record.Account.MQL_Type_Account__c} < VALUE ( RIGHT( TEXT( {!$Record.MQL_Type_Contact__c} ) , 1) ) , {!$Record.Account.MQL_Type_Account__c} , VALUE( RIGHT( TEXT( {!$Record.MQL_Type_Contact__c} ) , 1) ) ))

Flow.label: Lifecycle change: Opportunity Handler

subflows.name: Lifecycle_Stage_Prospect_and_Record_Type_Sales
subflows.label: Lifecycle Stage Prospect and Record Type Sales
